Key Match Events: Tyrese Halliburton led the Pacers with 33 points, 15 assists, and 5 rebounds.
Pascal Siakam recorded a double-double with 18 points and 11 rebounds.
Myles Turner contributed 21 points for the Pacers.
Kel’el Ware led the Heat with a career-high 25 points on 9 of 11 shooting.
Tyler Herro scored 17 points on 50% shooting.
Bam Adebayo added 20 points and 8 rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: Jimmy Butler requested a trade postgame, indicating he is open to playing anywhere but Miami.
Jimmy Butler expressed a desire to regain his joy for playing basketball, suggesting it would not happen in Miami.
